org.cmg.resp.comp
Class Node<T extends Knowledge>

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      org.cmg.resp.comp.Node<T>
All Implemented Interfaces:
INode<T>, MessageDispatcher
public class Node<T extends Knowledge>
extends java.util.Observable
implements MessageDispatcher, INode<T>

This class implements a generic SCEL components.

Author:
Michele Loreti

query

public Tuple query(Template template)
            throws java.lang.InterruptedException
Description copied from interface: INode
Queries a tuple matching template template from the local knowledge repository. This is a blocking: the thread invoking this method is blocked until a matching tuple is found.

Specified by:
query in interface INode<T extends Knowledge>
Parameters:
template - action template
Returns:
a matching tuple
Throws:

queryp

public Tuple queryp(Template template)
This is the predicative variant of action query. Differently from action query, this is not blocking. Indeed, if no tuple matching template is available in the local repository, value null is returned.

Specified by:
queryp in interface INode<T extends Knowledge>
Parameters:
template - action template
Returns:
a matching tuple or null.
